quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: But I can't be a missionary. I don't even believe in Jebus.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Dear Lord.. The gods have been good to me. For the first time in my life, everything is absolutely perfect just the way it is. So here's the deal: You freeze everything the way it is, and I won't ask for anything more. If that is OK, please give me absolutely no sign. OK, deal.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: It's gonna take a lot of fireworks to clean this place up.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: All normal people love meat. If I went to a barbeque and there was no meat, I would say 'Yo Goober! Where's the meat?'

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: The Internet? Is that thing still around?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: You must love this country more than I love a cold beer on a hot Christmas morning.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, what's wrong? Are you hungry? Sleepy? Gassy? Gassy? Is it gas? It's gas, isn't it?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I've always wondered if there was a God, and now I know there is. It's me.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm somewhere where I don't know where I am!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: [telling Bart about how he avoided jury duty] The trick is to say you're prejudiced against all races.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Homer no function beer well without.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Always give in to peer pressure.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Come on Lisa! Monkeys!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: All right, let's not panic. I'll make the money by selling one of my livers. I can get by with one.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Donuts. Is there anything they can't do?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm a white male, age 18 to 49. Everyone listens to me, no matter how dumb my suggestions are.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Have you ever heard of jetlag? (enunciating) JET... LAG?!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: You can't keep blaming yourself. Just blame yourself once, and move on

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Never! Never, Marge! I can't live the button-down life like you. I want it all: the terrifying lows, the dizzying highs, the creamy middles. Sure, I might offend a few of the bluenoses with my cocky stride and musky odors - oh, I'll never be the darling of the so-called city fathers, who cluck their tongues, stroke their beards, and talk about what's to be done with this Homer Simpson?!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: (on the phone) Hello, Thailand? How's everything on your end? (listens) Uh huh. That's some language you got there. (chuckling) And you talk like that 24/7, huh?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: The only monster here is the gambling monster that has enslaved your mother! I call him Gamblor, and it's time to snatch your mother from his neon claws!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Earth to Marge, earth to Marge. I was there. The clown is G-I-L-L-T-Y.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Boy, everyone is stupid except me.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Kids, you tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm having the best day of my life, and I owe it all to not going to Church!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, look at me! I'm making people happy! I'm the Magical Man, from Happy Land, in a gumdrop house on Lollipop Laaaaaaaaaaaane! [leaves the room, then pokes his head back in] Oh, by the way, I was being sarcastic. [leaves again]

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Do you want to change your name to Homer Junior? The kids can call you Hoju.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Son, if you really want something in this life, you have to work for it. Now quiet! They're about to announce the lottery numbers.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I won't apologize, Lisa. I'm sorry, but that's just the way that I am.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Television! Teacher, mother, secret lover.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I think the saddest day of my life was when I realized I could beat my Dad at most things. Bart experienced that at the age of four.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: You're not the only one who can abuse a non-profit organization.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Do I know what rhetorical means?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, I'm going to miss you so much. And it's not just the sex. It's also the food preparation.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, can we go home? All this fresh air is making my hair move and I don't know how long I can complain.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Don't worry. Being eaten by a crocodile is just like going to sleep... in a giant blender.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Help me, Jebus!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: God can't be everywhere, right?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Operator, get me Thailand. T, I... and so on.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I think Smithers picked me because of my motivational skills. Everyone says they have to work a lot harder when I'm around.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: [about Lisa] Did you hear that, Marge? She called me a baboon! The stupidest, ugliest, smelliest ape of them all!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Owww look at me Marge, I'm making people Happy! I'm the magical man, from Happy Land, who lives in a gumdrop house on Lolly Pop Lane!!!!...... By the way I was being sarcastic...

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Trying is the first step towards failure.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Dear Lord, the gods have been good to me and for the first time in my life, everything is absolutely perfect just the way it is. So here's the deal: You freeze everything the way it is and I won't ask for anything more. If that is ok, please give me absolutely no sign. (pause) Deal. In gratitude, I present you this offering of cookies and milk. If you want me to eat them for you, give me no sign. (pause) Thy will be done. (pigs out on the cookies)

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Goodbye, Lisa. Remember me as I am... filled with murderous rage!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If it doesn't have Siamese twins in a jar, it is not a fair.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Your mother seems really upset. I better go have a talk with her - during the commercial.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Trying is the first step towards failure.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If you don't like your job, you don't strike! You just go in every day, and do it really half assed. That's the American way.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Old people don't need companionship. They need to be isolated and studied so it can be determined what nutrients they have that might be extracted for our personal use.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Always remember that you're representing your country... I guess what I'm saying is, don't mess up France the way you messed up your room.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Kids, you tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Ah, ha ha! Look at that jerk! He dropped his notes! AH, HA HA!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Don't hassle the dead, boy. They have eerie powers.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: It's not easy to juggle a pregnant wife and a troubled child, but somehow I managed to fit in eight hours of TV a day.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Don't you know the saying? 'Water water everywhere, so let's all have a drink.'

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I saw this in a movie about a bus that had to speed around a city, keeping its speed over fifty, and if its speed dropped, it would explode. I think it was called... The Bus That Couldn't Slow Down.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Stupid gravity!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm in no condition to drive...wait! I shouldn't listen to myself, I'm drunk!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: You know, boys, a nuclear reactor is a lot like a woman. You just have to read the manual and press the right buttons.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I thought I had an appetite for destruction... but all I wanted was a club sandwich.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Lisa, a guy who's got lots of ivory is less likely to hurt Stampy than a guy whose ivory supplies are low.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Because they're stupid, that's why. That's why everybody does everything.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: All my life I've had one dream, to achieve my many goals.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Here's to alcohol, the cause of, and solution to, all life's problems.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Now for the easiest job for any coach... the cuts.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Fame was like a drug, but what was even more like a drug were the drugs.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Lisa, Vampires are make-believe, like elves, gremlins, and eskimos.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: When I look at the smiles on all the children's faces, I just know they're about to jab me with something.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm normally not a praying man, but if you're up there, please save me Superman.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: "To start, press any key." Where's the "any" key?! I see Kuh-tor-ull, Esc, and Pig-Up, but I don't see the "Any" key! Woah, all this computer hacking is making me thirsty, I think I'll order a tab. (Presses tab key) Ooh, too late for that now, the computer's starting!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Operator! Give me the number for 911!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: [drinking Duff beer] Ah... you can really taste the goat.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Everyone knows rock n' roll attained perfection in 1974; It's a scientific fact.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: First you don't want me to get the pony, now you want me to take it back. Make up your mind!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Hmm... fabulous house, well behaved kids, sisters in law dead, luxury sedan... Wohooo! I hit the jackpot!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Operator! Give me the number for 911!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Boy, when Marge first told me she was going to the Police Academy, I thought it would be fun and exciting, you know, like the movie... Spaceballs. But instead, it's been painful and disturbing, like the movie Police Academy.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I like my beer cold, my TV loud and my homosexuals flaming.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Bart, with $10,000, we'd be millionaires! We could buy all kinds of useful things like...love!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: How is education supposed to make me feel smarter? Besides, every time I learn something new, it pushes some old stuff out of my brain. Remember when I took that home winemaking course, and I forgot how to drive?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Beer. Now there's a temporary solution.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: They didn't have any aspirin, so I got you some cigarettes.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: As long as he has eight fingers and eight toes, he's fine by me. (While holding a newborn Bart)

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: A gun is not a weapon, Marge. It's a tool, like a butcher's knife, or a harpoon, or an alligator.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: We're goin' bowling. If we don't come back, avenge our deaths!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: What are you gonna do? Release the dogs?! Or the bees?! Or dogs with bees in their mouth so that when they bark they shoot bees at you?!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Alright Brain...It's all up to you.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: What is a wedding? Webster's Dictionary defines a wedding as "The process of removing weeds from one's garden."

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Don't eat me. I have a wife and kids. Eat them.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Homer no function beer well without.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Come here, Apu. If it'll make you feel any better, I've learned that life is one crushing defeat after another... until you just wish Flanders was dead.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Shut up, brain, or I'll stab you with a Q-Tip!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: That's it! You people have stood in my way long enough. I'm going to clown college!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Don't let Krusty's death get you down, boy. People die all the time, just like that. Why, you could wake up dead tomorrow. (long pause) Well... g'night!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Good things don't end in 'eum', they end in 'mania'... or 'teria'.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: My father never believed in me! I'm not gonna make the same mistake. From now on I'm gonna be kinder to my son and meaner to my dad.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Are you hugging the TV?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If something goes wrong at the plant, blame the guy who can't speak English.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Weaseling out of things is important to learn. It's what separates us from the animals ... except the weasel.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: When I look at the smiles on all the children's faces, I just know they're about to jab me with something.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Then I figured out we could just stick them in front of the TV. That's how I was raised, and I turned out TV.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Lisa, if you don't like your job you don't strike. You just go in every day and do it really half-assed. That's the American way.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm having the best day of my life, and I owe it all to not going to Church!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: What do we need a psychiatrist for? We know our kid is nuts.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Maybe, just once, someone will call me 'Sir' without adding, 'You're making a scene.'

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Enough. I grow weary of your sexually suggestive dancing. Bring me my ranch dressing hose!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Ah, sweet pity. Where would my love life be without it?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If something's hard to do, then it's not worth doing.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: In this house, we OBEY the laws of thermodynamics!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, everything's too damned expensive these days. Like this Bible: 15 bucks! And talk about a preachy book! According to this, everybody's a sinner! Except for this guy.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Operator! Give me the number for 911!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Weaseling out of things is important to learn! It's what separates us from the animals. Except the weasel...

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: It's not easy to juggle a pregnant wife and a troubled child, but somehow I managed to fit in eight hours of TV a day.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, I agree with you - in theory. In theory, Communism works. In theory.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh! Look at that car burn! Does it get any better than this?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Lisa, if the Bible has taught us nothing else, and it hasn't, it's that girls should stick to girls sports, such as hot oil wrestling and foxy boxing and such and such.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Beer, beer, beer, bed, bed, bed.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: God bless those pagans.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: When will I learn? The answer to life's problems aren't at the bottom of a bottle, they're on TV!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If something goes wrong at the plant, blame the guy who can't speak English. Ah, Tibor, how many times have you saved my butt? (chuckles)

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: There's so much I don't know about astrophysics! I wish I read that book by that wheelchair guy.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, don't discourage the boy! Weaseling out of things is important to learn. It's what separates us from the animals! Except the weasel.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, when I join an underground cult I expect a little support from my family.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: You can't keep blaming yourself. Just blame yourself once, and move on

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Wow, this plankton is only 33 cents!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Hey, he's not happy at all! He lied to us through song! I HATE when people do that!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, it's 3am. Shouldn't you be baking?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Bart, with $10,000 we'd be millionaires! We could buy all kinds of useful things like... love?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Son, when you participate in sporting events, it's not whether you win or lose: it's how drunk you get.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Bart, you're saying butt-kisser like it's a bad thing!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Not those peanuts... the ones at the bottom.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Old people don't need companionship. They need to be isolated and studied so it can be determined what nutrients they have that might be extracted for our personal use.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Dad, you've done a lot of great things, but you're a very old man, and old people are useless.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Remember that postcard Grandpa sent us from Florida of that Alligator biting that woman's bottom? That's right, we all thought it was hilarious. But, it turns out we were wrong. That alligator was sexually harrassing that woman.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I've always wondered if there was a god. And now I know there is -- and it's me.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, are we Jewish?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Just because I don't care doesn't mean I don't understand.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I want to share something with you: The three little sentences that will get you through life. Number 1: Cover for me. Number 2: Oh, good idea, Boss! Number 3: It was like that when I got here.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Don't blame me, I voted for Kodos.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm going to the back seat of my car with the woman I love... and I won't be back for ten minutes!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: (Homer bursts through the bedroom door and screams at a nervous Bart) Bart! You wanna see my new chainsaw and hockey mask?!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Of all the women in the world, I had to marry Jane Fonda!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Well, it's 1 a.m. Better go home and spend some quality time with the kids.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Ah! Tom Arnold! What's the hell's going on?!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm normally not a praying man, but if you're up there, please save me Superman.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Extended warranty? How could I lose?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: First you get the sugar, then you get the power, then you get the women.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Kill my boss? Do I dare live out the American dream?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If you really want something in this life you have to work for it. Now quiet, they're about to announce the lottery numbers.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If God didn't want us to eat in church, he would've made gluttony a sin.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If they think I'm going to stop at that stop sign, they're sadly mistaken!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Ah, the Luftwaffe. The Washington Generals of the History Channel.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: When will I learn? The answer to life's problems aren't at the bottom of a bottle, they're on TV!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I think Smithers picked me because of my motivational skills. Everyone says they have to work a lot harder when I'm around.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: 'To Start Press Any Key'. Where's the ANY key?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, so they have internet on computers now!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Well, it's 1am. Better go home and spend some quality time with the kids.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Donuts. Is there anything they can't do?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, Lisa, you and your stories. 'Bart is a vampire. Beer kills brain cells.' Now let's go to back to that... building...thingy.. where our beds and TV... is.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: (snoring and talking in his sleep during Frank Grimes' funeral service) Change the channel, Marge.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Son, when you participate in sporting events, it's not whether you win or lose: it's how drunk you get.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: [Meeting Aliens] Please don't eat me! I have a wife and kids. Eat them!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm never going to be disabled. I'm sick of being so healthy.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: But Marge, what if we picked the wrong religion? Each week we just make God madder and madder.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I saw weird stuff in that place last night. Weird, strange, sick, twisted, eerie, godless, evil stuff... and I want in.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marriage is like a coffin and each kid is another nail.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Pffft. Who needs English? I'm never going to England.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Go ahead and play the blues if it'll make you happy.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: What do we need a psychiatrist for? We know our kid is nuts.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Hmmm... I don't approve of his Bart-killing policy... but I do approve of his Selma-killing policy [subsequently votes for Sideshow Bob].

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Aw, Dad... you've done a lot of great things, but you're a very old man now, and old people are useless, aren't they? Aren't they? [he tickles Abe, who laughs]

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Your lives are in the hands of men no smarter than you or I, many of them incompetent boobs. I know this because I worked alongside them, gone bowling with them, watched them pass me over for promotions time and again. And I say... This stinks!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Aw, twenty dollars! I wanted a peanut!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Alcohol is a way of life, alcohol is my way of life, and I aim to keep it.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, everything looks bad if you remember it.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Well, if it isn't the leader of the wiener patrol, boning up on his nerd lessons.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I won't sleep in the same bed with a woman who thinks I'm lazy! I'm going right downstairs to unfold the couch, unroll the sleeping be... g'night.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Now, son, you don't want to drink beer. That's for daddies, and kids with fake IDs.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Beer: The cause of, and solution to, all of life's problems.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Television! Teacher, mother, secret lover.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: (drunk) Guess how many boobs I saw today? Fifteen!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm not a bad guy! I work hard, and I love my kids. So why should I spend half my Sunday hearing about how I'm going to Hell?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: America's health care system is second only to Japan... Canada, Sweden, Great Britain... well, all of Europe. But you can thank your lucky stars we don't live in Paraguay.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I hope I didn't brain my damage.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Kill my boss? Do I dare live out the American dream?

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: But Marge, what if we chose the wrong religion? Each week we just make God madder and madder.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Son, a woman is a lot like a... [looks around] a refrigerator! They're about six feet tall, 300 pounds. They make ice and, um... [spots his can of Duff] Oh, wait a minute. Actually, a woman is more like a beer. They smell good, they look good and you'd step over your own mother just to get one! [downs the beer] But you can't stop at one. You wanna drink another woman!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: (in New York) I'll get out of this city alive if it kills me!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, someone broke the toilet.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, people can come up with statistics to prove anything, Kent. Forty percent of people know that.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I feel like a candy wrapper caught in an updraft!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I want to share something with you. The three little sentences that will get you through life. Number one: Cover for me. Number two: Oh, good idea, boss! Number three: It was like that when I got here.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Aw, twenty dollars! I wanted a peanut!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Marge, it takes two to lie. One to lie and one to listen.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I would kill everyone in this room for a drop of sweet beer.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: If something's hard to do, then it's not worth doing

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Some people say I look like Dan Aykroyd.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Simpson! Homer Simpson! He's the greatest guy in history. From the, Town of Springfield! He's about to hit a chestnut tree!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Mr. Plow, that's my name, that name again is Mr. Plow!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I've figured out an alternative to giving up my beer. Basically, we become a family of traveling acrobats.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I like my beer cold, my TV loud and my homosexuals fuh-LAMING!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, people can come up with statistics to prove anything, Kent. 14% of people know that.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Getting out of jury duty is easy. The trick is to say you're prejudiced against all races.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Back, you robots! Nobody ruins my family vacation but me, and... maybe the boy!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Facts are meaningless. You can use facts to prove anything that's even remotely true!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I wasn't asleep! I was drunk!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: I'm going to the back seat of my car, with the woman I love, and I won't be back for ten minutes!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Oh, so they have internet on computers now!

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: Aw, twenty dollars... I wanted a peanut.

quotes.author: Homer J. Simpson
quotes.quote: You maniacs! You blew it up! Damn you! Damn you all to hell!
